uts.wsd.teamtwo

Class ReviewServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • uts.wsd.teamtwo.ReviewServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/reviewServlet")
public class ReviewServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The servlet that is responsible for posting and deleting reviews in response to requests from the web server.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • verifyPostReviewData

        private ComposeReviewErrorFields verifyPostReviewData(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String ratingString,
                                            java.lang.String message)
        Validate the data supplied via the HTTP request to determine whether the data is well formed and complies with the database schema (is valid).
        Parameters:
        title - The title supplied by the user
        ratingString - The rating supplied by the user
        message - The message supplied by the user
        Returns:
        Returns the result code. The result will identify any field that is not valid.
        See Also:
        ComposeReviewErrorFields

      • returnToPageWithError

        private void returnToPageWithError(int hotelId,
                         ComposeReviewErrorFields errorFields,
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                            throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Redirects the client to the review composition page, and supplies the set of errors that occurred.
        Parameters:
        hotelId - The ID of the hotel that this review was composed for
        errorFields - The error that was encountered when attempting to validate the review
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
